snippet: Brad Pitt says that from past experience, he knows being in contention for awards is no sure thing, but adds, "It is surprisingly fun when your number comes up."
abstract: Brad Pitt says that from past experience, he knows being in contention for awards is no sure thing, but adds, "It is surprisingly fun when your number comes up."
lead_paragraph: As our colleague Michael Cieply noted, Hollywood didn't exactly take a break over the holidays. Among other bits of business, the Oscar nomination ballots went out last week. The potential acting nominees include Brad Pitt, a contender for his performances in both "Moneyball" and "The Tree of Life." That last one may be a longshot, but, in a variation on the I'm-just-glad-to-be-nominated theme, Mr. Pitt told our colleague Dennis Lim that he's happy that his work is even part of the conversation. "I've been around long enough to know it's very fickle and it's a cyclical wheel," he said in the interview. "But I will say this: It is surprisingly fun when your number comes up." Read more »
